Case Study

Enterprise PAM Engineering

Senior Solutions Architect and PAM subject matter expert at Netwrix, designing and deploying enterprise privileged access and identity management solutions for complex environments.

Scope

  • Credential lifecycle automation using Python, PowerShell, and API-driven orchestration.
  • Session governance through proxied recording, monitoring, and just-in-time access controls.
  • Service account policy enforcement with vaulting, rotation, and risk-based access pathways.

Integration Architecture

Designed PAM integration patterns tying together SIEM/SOAR telemetry, ITSM workflows, and CI/CD deployment controls. The objective was not just control enforcement, but resilient, auditable operations with minimal friction for delivery teams.

Implementations emphasized deterministic onboarding, clean rollback paths, and measurable policy compliance.

Result

Delivered enterprise-grade privileged access platforms with repeatable automation patterns and governance models that held up under audit and production pressure.

Recognized with the Netwrix Hero Award (Q1 FY'25) for impact in enterprise PAM solution delivery.

Security Engineering. Agentic AI. Production-ready systems.
